body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Miller Motors customer support. My name is Scott Miller. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Scott, my name is Julia Watson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Julia. How can I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is eight six seven five five five zero nine seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Julia. In order to better assist you, could you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is juliawatson@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Julia. I will check our records and see how I can help you with the issue related to billing. Please allow me a few moments.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I've reviewed your account, Julia. I will investigate the billing matter further and get back to you with a resolution. Your patience is appreciated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out to us with your concern, Julia. I will work on resolving the issue promptly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Scott.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Julia. Thank you for contacting Miller Motors. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
